Design And Development

2008-2009, Business Process Management, Ruby on Rails

The application offered a web interface to freely:

  • map the geographical and organizational structure of the company.
  • to assign tasks as job descriptions to each member of the organization.
  • to collect these tasks into business processes and run them.

2009-, Clairvoyance to your business, Consulting

clair.ro offers web design, web application development and consultancy for small and medium companies in Romania.

We are focused on search engine optimized e-commerce solutions. All our clients rank 1-3 in Google search results without spending online for marketing.

2011-, The Ungainlyy Experienc, Freelance

Ungainlyy is a professional experiment in designing imperfection for the web.

Unlike other web designers I work with one client at a time. Each project takes 1-2 months and incorporates the best current techniques and practices in web design.
